name: Brookline Bancorp, Inc.
description: Brookline Bancorp, Inc. is a bank holding company headquartered in Brookline, Massachusetts. The company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Brookline Bank, which provides a wide range of financial services to individuals, businesses, and organizations. Established in 1871, Brookline Bank has a long history of community-focused banking, emphasizing personalized service and strong relationships with its customers. The bank offers a variety of products, including savings and checking accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. With a commitment to the communities it serves, Brookline Bancorp actively participates in local initiatives and supports economic development efforts. The company has expanded its footprint through strategic acquisitions and continues to enhance its digital banking solutions, ensuring customers can manage their finances conveniently and securely. Brookline Bancorp aims to provide a stable and secure banking environment while delivering competitive rates and exceptional customer service.

seo.meta_title: Brookline Bancorp, Inc. | Community-Focused Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Brookline Bancorp, Inc., a community bank offering personal and business banking solutions. Learn about our commitment to customer service and community support.

faq.question: What services does Brookline Bank offer?
faq.answer: Brookline Bank offers personal banking services, business banking solutions, loans, mortgages, and investment services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Brookline Bancorp?
faq.answer: Paul L. Perrault is the CEO of Brookline Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Brookline Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Brookline Bancorp is headquartered in Brookline, Massachusetts, USA.
